name: Flat Bench Press

instructions: Adjust the machine to fit your body and set a manageable starting weight.

Lower down slowly back to the start position.
Repeat while keeping the movement smooth.

instructions: Set up with the bar in a safe position and keep your body tight.
Lower into the bottom position with control.
Drive up through your feet to stand back up.
Repeat without letting your form change.

instructions: Set up with a stable position and keep your body tight.

Press the weight up smoothly to the top position.
Repeat for reps while keeping the same path each time.

name: Rope Hip Hinge (Cable Pull-Through)
description: A rope hip hinge (cable pull-through) exercise that targets the legs.
instructions: Set the cable to a comfortable height and take a stable stance.

Lower until you feel a strong stretch, then stand back up by driving hips forward.
Repeat with a controlled tempo.

instructions: Set up your body position and keep your midsection tight.

Return to the start position and repeat.

instructions: Stand or sit tall and keep your elbows close to your sides.
Curl the weight up under control.
Squeeze at the top, then lower slowly.
Repeat without rocking your body.
